bootDeviceExternal: Set SW402 dip switch to position 1:off, 2:off, 3:off, 4:on
Switch SW700 to the on position. Press and hold for 1 second the SW400 POWER push button.
flashIndicator: until the red LED 402 is off and switch SW700 to the off position
